pattern.title: Reference namespace uses reference namespace components

rule.context: xs:import[ nf:has-effective-conformance-target-identifier(., xs:anyURI('https://docs.oasis-open.org/niemopen/ns/specification/NDR/6.0/#ReferenceSchemaDocument')) and exists(@namespace) and empty(@appinfo:externalImportIndicator) and not(xs:anyURI(@namespace) = (xs:anyURI('https://docs.oasis-open.org/niemopen/ns/model/structures/6.0/'), xs:anyURI('http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace')))]
rule.assert: Rule 8-12: A component that is used in a reference namespace MUST be defined in a reference namespace.
